title: Hardest I've laughed all week
body:
> Lee Sin is a very high skill dependent champion that has been nerfed continuously since the beginning of his release. There was a time and place in the meta when Lee Sin was truly a terror in the jungle but unfortunately the current meta is not that place. Lee Sin falls off way easier than other jungle picks while also having a massive skill gap in Lee Sin players. Lee Sin is very inconsistent in the current meta of tanks and I'd highly suggest not picking him unless you're Insec or Gripex or you like losing.




"tahm kench/hecarim main streamer"

"muh rank 8 NA abusing freelo"

"lcs teams offered me but i declined lel"
